name: MovieFlix
overview: MovieFlix.com is the leading broadband movie provider and personal movie downloading service on the web. Founded in 1998, MovieFlix.com is a privately held company based in Hollywood, CA. MovieFlix maintains a library of over 4,000 full-length movies, short films, independent films and television shows in over thirty popular categories – many of which are offered to members for unlimited free viewing. MovieFlix’s viewing and downloading services are available on the internet at (http://www.movieflix.com/). MovieFlix also offers a MovieFlix Plus subscription package, which is available for a monthly fee and includes premium movies and unlimited downloads in addition to MovieFlix’s existing free movies. MovieFlix Plus members enjoy special benefits and services available exclusively to subscribers, including unlimited movie downloads from MovieFlix’s entire library of 4,000 films, access to premium content, personalized movie recommendations, online movie premieres, celebrity and filmmaker interviews, the option to use either Windows Media Player or Real Player, and 24/7 customer service available by phone or e-mail. MovieFlix has successfully partnered with industry leading companies including AOL, ALWAYSi, Covad, iFilm, Microsoft, NBCi, RealNetworks, RoadRunner, Rogers Communications, Screaming Media, TV Guide, Yack.com and Yahoo among others.
